description: Thanks for great tool and congratulations to all dev team who are working hard on this piece of software.

It would be nice if snapcraft society will provide fully integrated IDE for snap development like Apple XCode or Android Studio. And also supply runtimes for diff frameworks, because now snap app is very fat.
This is the first thing I uninstall on a fresh system. Recommend you do as well. Totally not secure.

This is good shop for every platform
hard to remember (some will forget to write)
sudo
apt
dnf
yum
pacman
yay

https://snapcraft.io
Snap Store "snapd"
Thanks & sugested by Tecnology Information
summary: Im moving with Cinnamon exploring linux systems..

description:
me encanta por que puedes instalar apps que no estan en Ubuntu Store en Ubuntu20.04, solo que es complicado por que tienes que meter Plugins y si te queda uno mal puedes resetear el PC, recomiendo: Que coloquen guias de los comandos para pricipiantes y en caso de que pongas un plugin mal te diga: Estas seguro? este plugin no esta bien escrito o no se reconocio, seguro de que quieres seguir?

a fin de cuentas es un app del sistema increible espero lean esto.. Hasta luego
